doc.title: Worst Date Ever
doc.plot: Everyone is looking for that special someone - and for our heroine it's a tall, hot looking guy from Queens. But something terrible is about to happen - something that will destroy our beautiful girl and leave her a hollow, broken shell of a human being. This is not a story for the faint of heart, those of delicate sensibilities, romantics, the elderly, or people who like stories that might be considered 'sweet' or 'quirky.' No. This is a two-fisted tale of dating gone bad.
